description: Issac has a natural curiosity to him that really is sexy and adorable at the same time. “I’m the type of guy that when I see people doing cool shit, I learn it and try to do it even better.” “So what can you do?” I asked. And with that Issac started showing us his flips as well as ton of other impressive tricks. He has a great body and great abs and they really popped when we took him to the cliffs to show off. “I’m usually not this much of a showoff, but fuck this is fun!” Issac even admitted to being a bit of a nudist. “I mean I don’t like to run around with my dick hanging in the wind, but I like swimming naked and stuff like that. Just a little bit of risk.”
title: Issac
